item.name: Create a DUST prototype v4 device

body.raw:
{
    "_id": "636deca1d73da24da581d975",
    "type": "dust-soil-v4",
    "name": "DUST Soil Device Prototype v4",
    "description": "Contains 1 internal temperature sensor, a battery sensor and 4 soil moisture sensors. It also reports some LoRaWAN stats.",
    "image_url": "https://via.placeholder.com/150"
}

{
    "_id": "635a7b85459684ee84a2d2c8",
    "type": "weatherstation-garni-1025-arcus",
    "name": "GARNI 1025 Arcus meteorological Wi-Fi station",
    "description": "The GARNI 1025 Arcus meteorological Wi-Fi station with an integrated 7-in-1 sensor is equipped with high-precision Swiss SENSIRION sensors with the possibility of calibration of some measured quantities. The main unit has an easy-to-read inverse color VA display that shows measured quantities, weather forecast, date, time and many other values.",
    "image_url": "https://www.garnitechnology.com/files/size/660-w_625-h_368-b_ffffff-d_1.webp"
}
